explanation: [0-0] In a room with a blue background, there is a monitor and a hand resting on a keyboard on the desk. The computer screen displays the Minecraft game, showing an Iron Golem standing on the grass with its back to the camera. The character's status and item quantity are displayed at the bottom of the screen.

[0-2] Next, the player-controlled character jumps forward and attacks the Iron Golem, causing its body to turn bright red. As the character steps back, the Iron Golem turns to face the player and walks to the left of the screen.

[2-4] The camera then switches to the player, a white-haired man wearing a black shirt and a black mask, staring intently at the monitor with a nervous expression.

[4-6] Then the screen cuts back to the monitor, where the player-controlled character has built a small platform. While jumping, the character places a wooden block beneath its feet to gain height. At this moment, the Iron Golem enters the screen from the left side. The player stops jumping and focuses on the Golem, which also looks up at the player.
